title: Operation response payload validation of definition <org.eclipse.ditto:HonoCommissioning:1.0.0> for message subject (operation name) <commissionDevice>
description: Perform commissioning of new device with own connectivity credential. Additional commisioning information is attempted to be derived from the context/environment.

code.description: Status code according to HTTP status code information; see https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7231#section-6
